name: Crate Hooks (STR+2 to Lifting or Melee Combat)

data.description:
Crate Hooks
Model: Vlanth Cargo Grippers
Type: Crate hooks
Skill: Lifting or melee combat
Cost: 50 per pair
Availability: 1
Damage: STR+1D
Game Notes: Although crate hooks make good melee weapons, they’re too small and awkward to be used to parry attacks.
Source: Platt’s Smugglers Guide (page 49)
data.label: OD6S.CHAR_GEAR
